title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama’s REST API—chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; chat, embed, pull, push, and list models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, LLM, and embeddings in LangChain apps.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embeddings connector for Ollama, enabling RAG pipelines with local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, multi-user support, and markdown rendering.

title: open-webui/open-webui
summary: Formerly ollama-webui; extensible self-hosted AI interface supporting Ollama, OpenAI, and more.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive CLI wrapper for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with Ollama models inside a sidebar panel; supports streaming and conversation history.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, and embed.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-chatbot-starter
summary: Starter template for building a chatbot with Ollama, FastAPI, and React frontend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama in various stacks.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose setups for Ollama with GPU support, monitoring, and reverse proxy examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing a lightweight TypeScript client for Ollama.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI; install via pip to chat, generate, and manage models.
